Get Publisher Policy by Publisher's Continent

Source: R/rromeo_publishers.R
rr_publisher_continent.Rd

Retrieve publisher's policy based on publisher's continent. This function does not work for unclassified or international publishers.

rr_publisher_continent(continent = c("Africa", "Antarctica", "Asia",
  "Australasia", "Caribbean", "Central America", "Europe", "North America",
  "Oceania", "South America"), key = NULL)

Arguments

continent

character(1+)
one or a vector of strings in c("Africa", "Antarctica", "Asia", "Australasia", "Carribean", "Central America", "Europe", "North America", "Oceania", "South America")
the continent name to retrieve
key

character(1)
a character string containing the API key or NULL (see Details section on how to specify it)

Value

Returns a data frame with the following columns:

  • romeoid integer(1)
    the internal index of the publisher in the SHERPA/RoMEO database

  • publisher character(1)
    the name of the publisher

  • alias character(1)
    if applicable an alternative name of the publisher or the name of the specific publishing branch

  • romeocolour character(1)
    a colour assigned by the database that reflects the default policies of the publisher

  • preprint character(1)
    is the preprint (not reviewed) archivable?

  • postprint character(1)
    is the postprint (reviewed but not formatted) archivable?

  • pdf character(1)
    is the publisher's version (reviewed and formatted) archivable?

Details

To provide your API key to rromeo you can:

  1. provide it as a character string as the key arguments of rromeo functions as rr_*(..., key = "my_key_as_a_string") (NOT RECOMMENDED)

  2. you can define the variable SHERPAROMEO_KEY in an .Renviron file in your working directory, the file should contain the following line SHERPAROMEO_KEY=my_key_without_quotes

  3. you can also define the variable SHERPAROMEO_KEY in an .Rprofile file in your working directory, the file should contain the following line SHERPAROMEO_KEY="my_key_with_quotes"

Examples


rr_publisher_continent(continent = "Caribbean")
#>    romeoid
#> 1     2192
#> 2     2687
#> 3     2614
#> 4     1371
#> 5     1717
#> 6     2942
#> 7     2815
#> 8     2034
#> 9     1280
#> 10    1505
#> 11    2620
#>                                                                                                                     publisher
#> 1                                                                             Instituto de Investigaciones de Sanidad Vegetal
#> 2                               Instituto Superior Politécnico José Antonio Echeverría-Cujae, Facultad de Ingeniería Mecánica
#> 3                                        Sistema Universitario Ana G. Mendez. Universidad Metropolitana, Escuela de Educación
#> 4                                                                                                   Sociedad Cubana de Física
#> 5                                                                                Sociedad Cubana de Neurología y Neurocirugía
#> 6  Universidad Central Marta Abreu de Las Villas, Facultad de Ciencias Agropecuarias, Centro de Investigaciones Agropecuarias
#> 7                                                                              Universidad de La Habana, Facultad de Biologia
#> 8                                                                                    Universidad de las Ciencias Informaticas
#> 9                                                                   Universidad de Las Tunas, Centro de Estudios de Didáctica
#> 10                                                                                                     Universidad de Oriente
#> 11                                                                    Universidad de Puerto Rico, Recinto de Ciencias Médicas
#>    alias romeocolour preprint postprint  pdf
#> 1   <NA>       green      can       can  can
#> 2   <NA>        blue   cannot       can  can
#> 3   <NA>       green      can    cannot  can
#> 4   <NA>       green      can       can <NA>
#> 5   <NA>        blue   cannot    cannot  can
#> 6   <NA>        blue   cannot    cannot  can
#> 7   <NA>       green      can       can  can
#> 8   <NA>        blue   cannot    cannot  can
#> 9   <NA>       green      can       can  can
#> 10  <NA>       green      can       can <NA>
#> 11  <NA>       green      can       can  can
rr_publisher_continent(continent = "Central America")
#>   romeoid                                                      publisher alias
#> 1     798                         Asociacion Nicaraguense de Entomologia  <NA>
#> 2    2243                Colegio Profesional de Psicologos de Costa Rica  <NA>
#> 3    1364                                      Universidad de Costa Rica  <NA>
#> 4     939 Universidad de Costa Rica, Centro Centroamericano de Población  <NA>
#> 5    1728                             Universidad Nacional de Costa Rica  <NA>
#>   romeocolour preprint postprint  pdf
#> 1        blue   cannot       can  can
#> 2        blue   cannot       can  can
#> 3       green      can       can  can
#> 4        blue   cannot       can <NA>
#> 5       green      can       can  can
rr_publisher_continent(continent = c("Caribbean", "Central America"))
